column2: A Judgment is  the  final  decision of the  court intimated  to  the  parties  and  to  the  world  at  large
by formal pronouncement or delivery in open court ... "
interpreted the Judgment as the "final decision of court".

column1: With  regard  to  the  term  order  referred  to  in  section 316  of the  Code  of Criminal  Procedure  Act,  the

column2: Learned Senior Deputy Solicitor General has brought to  our notice of section 331  (2) of the same Act,
in the absence of specific interpretation to  the term order in the Act.
